title: Song of Night
description: Everything I thought I knew is a lie…The City of Night has always been a dangerous place, but never more so than now.Enemies on our doorstep. A battle brewing. The wild magic out of control, and my connection to it entirely severed. Not to mention I’m imprisoned by my former mentor who betrayed me.But none of that matters as much as finding Asher, and repairing the damage I did.SONG OF NIGHT is an enemies-to-lovers fantasy romance that will appeal to fans of Sarah J. Maas and Jennifer Armentrout. It’s the second in a duology.
author: Aurora Grey
